name: Gem Master (itch)
description:
Producer: Shun min Hsieh

Student ID: 101212629

The goal of this game is to open all chests.

Kill the spiders to get gems of different colors.

The gems dropped by spiders only have three colors of red, green and blue, but you can make more colors by mixing.

Whenever you pick up 2 gems, you can press the MIX button to mix them.

The mixed gems will automatically be placed in your collection.

You can put up to 4 gems in your collection at a time.

Depending on the level of the chest, the number of gems required is also different.

The color of the gems required to open each chest is random. 

If you have the same gems in your collection as the gems needed for opening the chest, you will be able to open the chest.
